description: Architecture improvements: shared useEnterKey hook, LinkAsButton component for accessible buttons styled as links, standardized CSS-in-JS styling, added named exports to components.

Alphabet selection; Game mode selection (minuscules, MAJUSCULES, or both); Notes on individual characters; Keyboard shift keys visibility based on game mode; added new alphabet from Howard; begin adding letters with word level context.
Baseline visualisation; Code splitting for faster page load / time to interactive; What's new section on landing page.
